author: hship
msg: Create a special case in PageRecorder for converting EJB references to handles for
storage and vice-versa when the page is restored.
Fix a previously unnoticed problem caused by bad timing in the interaction between
committing page changes and lazy creation of persistent page properties.
Add new checks to the PageRecorder to detect when a persistent property changes during page rendering.

author: hship
msg: Attempt a few minor optimizations related to PropertyHelper and PropertyBinding.

author: hship
msg: Make sure the visit object is created only when needed.

author: hship
msg: Update the Vlib application to use the new FieldLabel component.

author: hship
msg: Add the FieldLabel component, used for providing a label for validating text fields.
Fix a typo that broke the Rollover component.
